sen.j: 野村万之介（のむらまんのすけ、1939年5月2日 -）は和泉流狂言師。
sen.e: Mannosuke NOMURA (May 2, 1939 -) is a Kyogen performer of Izumi school.
Mannosuke NOMURA (May 2, 1939 -) is a Kyogen performer of Izumi school.
Mannosuke NOMURA (May 2, 1939 -) is a Kyogen performer of Izumi school.
He is the fifth son of the sixth Manzo NOMURA.
He is the fifth son of the sixth Manzo NOMURA.
He is the fifth son of the sixth Manzo NOMURA.

sen.j: 兄に狂言師の野村萬（七世野村万蔵）、野村万作、観世流能楽師の野村四郎がいる。
sen.e: His elder brothers are Man NOMURA (Manzo Nomura, the seventh), Mansaku NOMURA and Shiro NOMURA, who is Nohgakushi (Noh actor) of Kanze school.
His older brothers are Man NOMURA (Manzo Nomura, the seventh), Mansaku NOMURA and Shiro NOMURA who is Nohgakushi (Noh actor) of Kanze school.
sen.cmt: olderに訂正しました。コンマ削除しました。
sen.e: His older brothers are Man NOMURA (Manzo Nomura, the seventh), Mansaku NOMURA and Shiro NOMURA who is Nohgakushi (Noh actor) of Kanze school.
His real name: Goro NOMURA
His real name: Goro NOMURA
His real name: Goro NOMURA
He left the literature department of Chuo University without a diploma.
He left the literature department of Chuo University without a diploma.
He left the literature department of Chuo University without a diploma.

sen.j: 「万作の会」の重要メンバーとして国内外で活躍。
sen.e: He has been at the forefront at home and overseasas an important member of 'Mansaku no kai (the kyogen performance group).'
He has been at the forefront at home and overseas as an important member of 'Mansaku no kai' (the kyogen performance group).
sen.cmt: 不要な改行を削除しました。括弧の位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: He has been at the forefront at home and overseas as an important member of 'Mansaku no kai' (the kyogen performance group).

sen.j: 兄・万作や甥・萬斎には知名度の点では劣るものの、万作一門を支える重要な屋台骨の一人。
sen.e: Although Mannosuke is not as famous as his brother Mansaku or his nephew Mansai, he is one of the important backbones who support Mansaku family.
Although Mannosuke is not as famous as his brother Mansaku or his nephew Mansai, he is one of the important backbones who support Mansaku family.
Although Mannosuke is not as famous as his brother Mansaku or his nephew Mansai, he is one of the important backbones who support Mansaku family.

sen.j: 型にとらわれない、鷹揚で自由奔放な芸風で、固定ファンも多い。
sen.e: His acting style is not fixed but easygoing and freewheeling and has a really solid base audience.
His acting style is not fixed but easygoing and freewheeling and has a really solid base audience.
His acting style is not fixed but easygoing and freewheeling and has a really solid base audience.

sen.j: また、万作の後を受け、昭和43年頃から現在まで、東京大学・早稲田大学の狂言サークルを指導している。
sen.e: Mannosuke, succeeding to Mansaku, has been teaching at Kyogen club (club of farce played during a Noh cycle) at Tokyo University and Waseda University since around 1968.
Mannosuke, succeeding to Mansaku, has been teaching at Kyogen club (club of farce played during a Noh cycle) at Tokyo University and Waseda University since around 1968.
Mannosuke, succeeding to Mansaku, has been teaching at Kyogen club (club of farce played during a Noh cycle) at Tokyo University and Waseda University since around 1968.

tit.e: Chronological list of the main events
Chronological list of the main events

sen.e: In 1944, he made a debut in 'Hachi-tataki (A begging priest who goes about beating an iron bowl).'
1944: He made a debut in 'Hachi-tataki' (A begging priest who goes about beating an iron bowl).
sen.cmt: 表記訂正しました。括弧位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: 1944: He made a debut in 'Hachi-tataki' (A begging priest who goes about beating an iron bowl).
In 1970, he played 'Tsuri kitsune (Fox Trapping).'
1970: He played 'Tsuri kitsune' (Fox Trapping).
sen.cmt: 表記訂正しました。括弧位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: 1970: He played 'Tsuri kitsune' (Fox Trapping).

sen.j: 1980年 芸術選奨文部大臣新人賞受賞
sen.e: In 1980, he received the new face award of Minister of Education Award for Fine Arts.
1980: He received the new face award of Minister of Education Award for Fine Arts.
1980: He received the new face award of Minister of Education Award for Fine Arts.

sen.j: 1982年より 日本能楽会会員
sen.e: Since 1982, he has been a member of The Association for Japanese Noh Plays.
Since 1982: He has been a member of The Association for Japanese Noh Plays.
Since 1982: He has been a member of The Association for Japanese Noh Plays.

sen.j: 1990年より 万之介狂言の会を主催
sen.e: Since 1990, he has been leading 'Manosuke kyogen no kai '(gathering of Mannosuke's kyogen (farce played during a Noh cycle)).
Since 1990: He has been leading 'Manosuke kyogen no kai' (gathering of Mannosuke's kyogen [farce played during a Noh cycle]).
